name: Memory Management
description: Handles memory storage and retrieval using a SQLite database.
author: Shinkai

data.description: The data to process for memory management, if not provided, the tool will return existing memories

general_prompt.description: The general prompt for generating memories

specific_prompt.description: The specific prompt for generating memories

key.description: The key for specific memory retrieval

sqlTables.name: memory_table
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS memory_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, date DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, key TEXT, memory TEXT)

sqlQueries.name: Get general memory
sqlQueries.query: SELECT id, key, memory FROM memory_table WHERE key IS NULL

sqlQueries.name: Get specific memory
sqlQueries.query: SELECT id, key, memory FROM memory_table WHERE key = ?

sqlQueries.name: Update memory
sqlQueries.query: UPDATE memory_table SET memory = ? WHERE id = ?
